# Custom Gene Set Enrichment Analysis (GSEA)

- Aim 1: Perform functional enrichment analysis (GSEA) of a gene list on a custom gene signature
    - 1.1, GSEA of a gene list on MSigDb signatures
    - 1.2, GSEA of a gene list on a custom gene signature
    - 1.3, Make GSEA enrichment plot

- Review slides and references in the "14 - Functional enrichment analysis" section at https://mdozmorov.github.io/BIOS567.2017/syllabus/

- [clusterProfiler](https://bioconductor.org/packages/clusterProfiler/) is the R package to perform these analyses. Read the [clusterProfiler's manual](https://yulab-smu.github.io/clusterProfiler-book/)
